seeker - Variable in class client.model.RoomsGetter
Seeker which works with the same nework interface.
Seeker - Class in client.model
Sends Multicast packets to specific multicast group so, server could recognize, at which IP the client is located.
Seeker(InetAddress, int) - Constructor for class client.model.Seeker
 
sendBackPacket() - Method in class client.model.RoomsGetter
Sends back packets, if server is not responding, until RoomsGetter.run() method will stop listening.

Sends message to server.

Sends message to connected server.

sendToAll(String, ClientHandler) - Method in class server.model.ClientConnector
Sends client's message to all connected clients, except the sender.
sendToAllAnon(String, ClientHandler) - Method in class server.model.ClientConnector

SERVER_STRING - Static variable in class server.model.ServerConstants

Establishes client's nickname field (ClientHandler.nickname) and prevents client's nicknames from repeating.
